      • addBefore

        public static PsiStatement addBefore(PsiStatement anchor,
                                     PsiStatement... newStatements)
        Adds new statements before given anchor statement creating a new code block, if necessary
        Parameters:
        anchor - existing statement
        newStatements - the new statements which should be added before the existing one
        Returns:
        last added physical statement

      • addAfter

        public static PsiStatement addAfter(PsiStatement anchor,
                                    PsiStatement newStatement)
        Add new statement after given anchor statement creating code block, if necessary
        Parameters:
        anchor - existing statement
        newStatement - a new statement which should be added after an existing one
        Returns:
        added physical statement

      • expandSingleStatementToBlockStatement

        public static <T extends PsiStatement> T expandSingleStatementToBlockStatement(T statement)
        Replaces a statement with a block statement with the statement inside it. As usual the block statement contains a code block, which will contain the specified statement.
        Parameters:
        statement - the statement to replace
        Returns:
        a new statement equivalent to the argument, but inside a block
